qas.question: Which pope began using creati et reservati in pectore?
How were many Cardinals created during the Eastern Schism>?

plausible_answers.text: cardinals were created without publishing their names

qas.question: What was published during the reign of Pope Martin V?
What did Pope Pious V begin using?
What position was not being contended during the Western Schism?

context: During the Western Schism, many cardinals were created <b1_0>by the contending <b4_0>popes<b4_0/><b1_0/>. Beginning with the reign of <a0_0>Pope Martin V<a0_0/>, <b2_0>cardinals were created without publishing their names<b2_0/> until later, termed <b3_0>creati et reservati in pectore.
